mapper.select: select users.userid, password, username, enabled, regDate, updateDate, authority from users LEFT OUTER JOIN users_authorities on users.userid = users_authorities.userid where users.userid = #{userId};

select users.userid, password, username, enabled, regDate, updateDate, authority from users LEFT OUTER JOIN users_authorities on users.userid = users_authorities.userid where users.username = #{userName};

select users.userid, password, username, enabled, regDate, updateDate, authority, users_authorities.userid from users LEFT OUTER JOIN users_authorities on users.userid = users_authorities.userid order by field(authority, 'ROLE_ADMIN', 'ROLE_MEMBER') DESC, users.userid asc;
mapper.insert: insert into users(userid, password, username) values (#{userId}, #{password}, #{userName});
